metadata.dc:title: Psychosomatic models
metadata.dc:creator: Alarcón, Fco Javier
metadata.dc:description: The author tries to study the three models inherent to the psychosomatic phenomenon: hysteria, in which the repressed representation returns via the organic symptoms, the functional diseases from which the confined emotions emerge and the mental functioning of the organic patients, using the model of the psychosomatic school of Paris. The author establishes the mind body monism as the axis of the psychosomatic conception. Each of the three models are illustrated by clinical material (AU)
metadata.dc:title: Modelos en Psicosomática
